summaryOfNewsArticle: On April 2, 2024, the cultural sector launched a series of new initiatives aimed at promoting cultural activities and engagement. These efforts are expected to continue through April 2, 2025, with a focus on enhancing community participation and preserving cultural heritage. The article highlights the importance of ongoing cultural development and the commitment to sustained growth in the sector.
title: Cultural Sector Launches New Initiatives for 2024-2025 Period
